org.echo.mobile.framework.model.eddsa

Class EdAuthority

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.model.eddsa.EdAuthority
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteSerializable, GrapheneSerializable, JsonSerializable

    public class EdAuthority
implements GrapheneSerializable

    Class used to represent the weighted set of keys and accounts that must approve operations. Uses EdDSA algorithm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EdAuthority.Companion 
      static class  EdAuthority.Deserializer
      Custom deserializer used while parsing the 'get_account' API call response.
